statements: SELECT * FROM StudentFeedback;
SELECT student_name, course_id FROM StudentFeedback WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, feedback FROM StudentFeedback WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM StudentFeedback WHERE student_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT student_name, course_id, feedback FROM StudentFeedback ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM StudentFeedback WHERE id = 1;
SELECT student_name, course_id FROM StudentFeedback WHERE course_id = 101 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT AVG(course_id) AS average_course_id FROM StudentFeedback GROUP BY course_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM StudentFeedback WHERE student_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT student_name, feedback FROM StudentFeedback WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3) AND course_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY id DESC, course_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM students
SELECT student_name, email FROM students ORDER BY student_name ASC
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE evaluation_score > 80
SELECT student_name, feedback FROM students WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com'
SELECT * FROM courses ORDER BY evaluation_score DESC
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT course_name, evaluation_score FROM courses ORDER BY evaluation_score DESC;
SELECT student_name, feedback FROM students JOIN courses ON students.student_id = courses.course_id WHERE evaluation_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM student_feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, course_id FROM student_feedback;
SELECT student_id, course_id, feedback_text FROM student_feedback ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, feedback_text FROM student_feedback WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT student_id, course_id, COUNT(*) AS feedback_count FROM student_course_feedback GROUP BY student_id, course_id;
SELECT student_id, course_id, feedback_text FROM student_feedback WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT * FROM student_feedback ORDER BY course_id DESC, student_id ASC
SELECT course_id, AVG(evaluation_score) AS average_score FROM course_evaluations GROUP BY course_id ORDER BY average_score DESC
SELECT student_id, course_id, feedback_date, feedback FROM student_course_feedback WHERE feedback LIKE '%good%'
SELECT course_id, COUNT(evaluation_id) AS num_evaluations FROM course_evaluations GROUP BY course_id HAVING num_evaluations > 2
SELECT * FROM Courses;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM Courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_id > 100 ORDER BY student_name;
SELECT * FROM Feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT evaluation_id, feedback_id, evaluation_date, evaluation_score FROM Evaluations ORDER BY evaluation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Courses;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 2;
SELECT course_name, student_name, rating FROM Courses INNER JOIN Feedback ON Courses.course_id = Feedback.course_id;

SELECT student_name, evaluation_score, evaluation_date FROM Students INNER JOIN Feedback ON Students.student_id = Feedback.student_id INNER JOIN Evaluations ON Feedback.feedback_id = Evaluations.feedback_id;
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Course;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Student;
SELECT course_id, rating, comment FROM Feedback;
SELECT course_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM Feedback GROUP BY course_id;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Course;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Student ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, rating_avg FROM Course INNER JOIN Evaluation ON Course.course_id = Evaluation.course_id WHERE Evaluation.rating_avg > 4.5;

SELECT student_name, course_name, rating FROM Student INNER JOIN Feedback ON Student.student_id = Feedback.student_id INNER JOIN Course ON Feedback.course_id = Course.course_id ORDER BY student_name ASC, rating DESC;

SELECT course_name, student_name, date_enrolled FROM CourseHistory INNER JOIN Course ON CourseHistory.course_id = Course.course_id INNER JOIN Student ON CourseHistory.student_id = Student.student_id WHERE CourseHistory.completion_status = TRUE;
